lyrics:
34 contributorstranslationsहिन्दीyes lyricsverse 1
when it started we had high hopes
now my backs on the line my backs on the ropes
when it started we were alright
but night makes a fool of us in the daylight

verse 2
there we were dyin of frustration
sayin lord lead me not into temptation
but its not easy when she turns you on
sin stay gone

chorus 1
if youd only if youd only say yes
whether you wills anybodys guess
god only god knows im tryin my best
but im just so tired of this loneliness

interlude
hey

verse 3
so up they picked me by the big toe
i was held from the rooftop then they let go
dizzily screamin let the windows down
as i crumble to the ground
see coldplay liveget tickets as low as 113you might also likechorus 2
if youd only if youd only say yes
whether you wills anybodys guess
god only god knows she wont let me rest
but im just so tired of this loneliness
ive become so tired of this loneliness8embed
